definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

sentences.english: The second chapter makes contribution in chemical fiber for Qian Baojun science and technology.
sentences.chinese: 第二章爲錢寶鈞在化學纖維研究方面的貢獻。

sentences.english: A time of continual change is taking place within, and around, the manufactured fiber industry.
sentences.chinese: 化學纖維工業正在發生連續不斷的變化。

sentences.english: The North American manufactured fiber industry is looking ahead to these challenges and opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 北美化學纖維工業正在期待這些挑戰和機遇。

sentences.english: They have chemical-resistant fibers that hold up to the harshest dental materials.
sentences.chinese: 他們擁有抗化學纖維，可承受最苛刻的牙科材料。

sentences.english: Spinning Machinery and Twisting Machines for Natural and Man Made Fibres.
sentences.chinese: 天然纖維和化學纖維用紡紗機及加捻機械。
